original_text: Do not become like the people who belong to this world. But let God completely change the way that you think, so that you live differently. Then you will understand what God wants you to do. You will know what is good. You will know what pleases God. You will know what is completely right.
korean_text: 너희는 이 세대를 본받지 말고 오직 마음을 새롭게 함으로 변화를 받아 하나님의 선하시고 기뻐하시고 온전하신 뜻이 무엇인지 분별하도록 하라

sentences.original_text: Do not become like the people

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 하나님이 완전히 변하게 하시도록 하라

sentences.original_text: what God wants you to do
You will know what is good
You will know what pleases God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 무엇이 하나님을 기쁘게 하는지 알 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will know what is completely right
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 무엇이 완전히 올바른지 알 것이다
